1.4.6.name: wordpress/the-skeleton
1.4.6.description: Responsive advance theme made for Web developers and WordPress junkies with flexible foundation, WooCommerce and bbPress integration and Compatibility. This theme adapts your website to any viewing environment, mobile and desktop. Theme features 7 Page Templates, 5 Widget Areas (Main Sidebar, Sidebar Left, 3 Widget Columns for front page featured content), 3 Menu Positions (Top Menu, Main Menu and Footer Menu). Simple Theme Options to insert your own Custom CSS, Front Page Section (change WooCommerce Header area for featured content, change featured content area header, change blogging header, Enable / Disable WooCommerce Section and Featured Section...also change profile link in header (by default sends user to the bbpress profile) ..), Social links (change facebook,twitter and email links), Sidebar Controller (change/insert left sidebar for posts,pages and archives). Localization Ready - to be translated into your own language (Included language of English Only), RTL-Language Support
